message.En: Available for Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: متاح للتسليم بعملة ${eta}

message.En: Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: التسليم بعملة ${eta}

message.En: Cannot guarantee Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: لا يمكن ضمان التسليم في ${eta}

message.En: Delivering your order in ${eta}
message.Ar: توصيل طلبك بـ ${eta}

message.En: Delivering your order in next ${eta}
message.Ar: توصيل طلبك في ${eta} القادم

message.En: Your order is delivered as promised. Enjoy
message.Ar: يتم تسليم طلبك كما وعدت. يتمتع

message.En: Sorry :( Our order took more time. We will send a coupon. Please check ${specialOffersLink} in some time
message.Ar: عذرًا :( طلبنا استغرق وقتًا أطول. سنرسل قسيمة. يرجى التحقق من ${specialOffersLink} في وقت ما

message.En: As our order took more time, we have sent you a coupon which you can avail on your next order. To view this coupon, please go to special offers.
message.Ar: نظرًا لأن طلبنا استغرق وقتًا أطول ، فقد أرسلنا لك قسيمة يمكنك الاستفادة منها في طلبك التالي. لعرض هذه القسيمة ، يرجى الذهاب إلى العروض الخاصة.

message.En: Add Non Deals items worth ${diff} or more to apply coupon
message.Ar: أو أكثر لتطبيق القسيمة {diff}$ أضف عناصر غير صفقات بقيمة

message.En: Coupon Applied! You just received a discount of ${discount}
message.Ar: {discount}$ تم تطبيق القسيمة! لقد تلقيت للتو خص ًما بقيمة

GO_GREEN_DESCRIPTION.Ar: الأعمال الصغيرة عندما تتضاعف في عدة أشخاص ، يمكن أن تغير العالم
قم بإجراء تغييرات صغيرة يوميًا للحفاظ على البيئة
GO_GREEN_DESCRIPTION.En: Small Acts when multiplied by several people, can change the world

contrySpecificValidation.deliveryFeeBreakupTitle: Delivery fee breakup for this order
contrySpecificValidation.deliveryFeeBreakup: Hurray! Enjoy your meal at discounted delivery charges for limited period. T&C applied

message.En: Available for Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: متاح للتسليم بعملة ${eta}

message.En: Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: التسليم بعملة ${eta}

message.En: Cannot guarantee Delivery in ${eta}
message.Ar: لا يمكن ضمان التسليم في ${eta}

message.En: Delivering your order in ${eta}
message.Ar: توصيل طلبك بـ ${eta}

message.En: Delivering your order in next ${eta}
message.Ar: توصيل طلبك في ${eta} القادم

message.En: Your order is delivered as promised. Enjoy
message.Ar: يتم تسليم طلبك كما وعدت. يتمتع

message.En: Sorry :( Our order took more time. We will send a coupon. Please check ${specialOffersLink} in some time
message.Ar: عذرًا :( طلبنا استغرق وقتًا أطول. سنرسل قسيمة. يرجى التحقق من ${specialOffersLink} في وقت ما

message.En: As our order took more time, we have sent you a coupon which you can avail on your next order. To view this coupon, please go to special offers.
message.Ar: نظرًا لأن طلبنا استغرق وقتًا أطول ، فقد أرسلنا لك قسيمة يمكنك الاستفادة منها في طلبك التالي. لعرض هذه القسيمة ، يرجى الذهاب إلى العروض الخاصة.

message.En: Add Non Deals items worth ${diff} or more to apply coupon
message.Ar: أو أكثر لتطبيق القسيمة {diff}$ أضف عناصر غير صفقات بقيمة

message.En: Coupon Applied! You just received a discount of ${discount}
message.Ar: {discount}$ تم تطبيق القسيمة! لقد تلقيت للتو خص ًما بقيمة

LOADING_SCREEN.description2: should only take a few seconds

SUCCESS.description: Your order is successfully placed via LIGHTNING PAY! We'll start preparing it shortly!
SUCCESS.title: Woohoo !

VALIDATION.INVALID_COUNTRY_CODE: Your number belongs to another country

VALIDATION.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address

VALIDATION.QR_ALIGNMENT_ERROR:
Please align the QR code
within the Scanner
VALIDATION.ALERT_INVALID_STORE_DESC: No store found with this ID that serves ${serviceType}. Please select store from the available ones in the list.
VALIDATION.ALERT_UNABLE_TO_READ_QR_DESC: We are facing some issue to read this QR Code. Please select the store manually.
VALIDATION.INVALID_PHONE_NO_BEGINNING: Please enter a valid number starting from "${digit} digits"

VISIBAL_INACTIVE_ADDRESS_MODE.title: Comming Soon
VISIBAL_INACTIVE_ADDRESS_MODE.msg: ${addressMode}Delivery will be available soon. Till then please opt for ${otherServiceType} or visit store for mouth watering Wimpy delights

LOGOUT_POPUP.msg: Are you sure you want to log out?

NO_NEAR_BY_STORES.title: uh. oh!
NO_NEAR_BY_STORES.msg:
It seems like your location is far away from any of our stores. 
 Are you sure you would like to proceed?

ERROR.COUPON_USAGE_EXHAUST: You have made all the redemptions for the coupon. Please review your cart.
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE: Your cart sub-total (exclusive of delivery charges) should be more than ${minCartValue} to place the order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_PICKUP: Your cart sub-total should be more than ${minCartValue} to place the order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_COUPON_APPLIED: Total must be ${minCartValue} in order to proceed with this order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_COUPON_APPLIED_PICKUP: Total must be ${minCartValue} in order to proceed with this order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_COUPON_NOT_APPLIED: Add items worth ${minCartValue} more to proceed with this order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_COUPON_NOT_APPLIED_PICKUP: Add items worth ${minCartValue} more to proceed with this order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_POPUP: Total must be ${minCartValue} in order to proceed with this order
ERROR.MIN_CART_VALUE_POPUP_PIKCUP: Total must be ${minCartValue} in order to proceed with this order
ERROR.SERVICE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION: {service_type} is not available for this country at the moment
ERROR.CART_DROP_MESSAGE: Menu prices may vary for your selected location. Would you like to continue with clearing your cart and switching location?
ERROR.ADVANCE_ORDER_OTHER_SERVICE: Unavailable for this store at the moment

SINGLE_CHANGE_COUNTRY_ALERT.message: Sorry, we are currently serving locations within ${country} only. Please select a location within ${country} to continue with your order.

MULTI_CHANGE_COUNTRY_ALERT.message: The location you are looking for, seems to be outside ${country1}. Please select a location within ${country2} to continue with your order.

SEARCH_CHANGE_COUNTRY_ALERT.message: The location that you are looking for seems to be outside ${country}. Do you want to change country?

MENU.NOT_AVAILABLE: The availability of one or more items or customizations in your cart might have changed. Please modify your cart in order to continue!
MENU.PRICE_CHANGE: The pricing of one of the items in your cart might have changed. Please review your cart in order to continue!
MENU.SERVICE_TYPE_NOT_AVAILABLE: We would not be able to serve one or more items in your cart for the selected order mode. Please change order mode or remove to continue!
MENU.SLOT_UNAVAILABLE: The availability of one of the items in your cart might have changed. Please modify your cart in order to continue!
MENU.SLOT_UNAVIALABLE_FUTURE_ORDER: The pricing or the availability of one or more items or customizations in your cart might be changing for the selected date/time. Please modify your cart in order to continue.

ERROR.PAYMENT_METHOD_NOT_AVAILABLE: This is not available at the moment
ERROR.PAYMENT_METHOD_CHANGE_WARNING: The selected payment made cannot be changed later
